channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Arena Master
channel.description:
**[color=#FF287D]Arena Master[/color] (Neutral Special)**
The [color=#FF287D]Arena Master[/color] is a "special" type neutral that enjoys watching others fight. The [color=#FF287D]Arena Master[/color] cannot be converted.
Goal: Have your champion win 3 games. (They can be different champions)
This role is unique.
Kills by the [color=#FF287D]Arena Master[/color] will be annouced as such: **"x was killed in the Arena."**
Passive: Conditioning of the Arena You and your champion are immune to death at night and from being occupied. Your champion is notified of their status. You and your champion may chat at night.
Day 1: Coercion of Champions If you don't have a champion, select someone to be your champion.
Day Ability 2: Forced Participation Your next use of Enter the Arena will have the fight occur the same night. - 2 uses
Night Ability: Enter the Arena Choose a player to fight your champion tomorrow night. The loser dies. This does NOT count as a roleblock. (Winner based on role list.)
[color=red]Offensive[/color] loses to [color=#25EDF2]Defensive[/color]. [color=#25EDF2]Defensive[/color] loses to [color=green]Patient[/color]. [color=green]Patient[/color] loses to [color=red]Offensive[/color]. [color=purple]Cheater[/color] wins against any. [color=pink]Fool[/color] cannot be chosen as a champion or fighter, attempts to choose him will fail.
If two players are in the same category, then it will follow the fight tier list.
Bolded are unofficial classes.
[color=red]Offensive[/color]: [color=blue]Knight[/color] < [color=gray]Mercenary[/color] < [color=blue]Paladin[/color] < [color=purple]Assassin[/color]/[color=red]Invoker[/color] < [color=gray]Possessor[/color] < [color=gray]Reaper[/color] < [color=orange]**Demon**[/color] [color=#25EDF2]Defensive[/color]: [color=blue]Noble[/color] < [color=blue]Princess[/color] < [color=blue]Court Wizard[/color] < [color=blue]Priest[/color] < [color=green]The Alchemist[/color] < [color=blue]Physician[/color] < [color=red]Ritualist[/color] [color=green]Patient[/color]: [color=blue]Psychic[/color] < [color=blue]**Maid**[/color] < [color=blue]Butler[/color] < [color=red]Apostle[/color] < [color=blue]Observer[/color] < [color=blue]Sheriff[/color] < [color=red]Seeker[/color] < [color=#43FF28]**The Electricutioner**[/color] [color=purple]Cheater[/color]: [color=#ECEE45]**The Greedy**[/color] < [color=red]**Acolyte**[/color] < [color=blue]**Squire**[/color] < [color=#AE3620]**The Scorpion**[/color] < [color=blue]Prince[/color] < [color=purple]MM[/color]/[color=red]CL[/color] < [color=#FF287D]**Arena Master**[/color]
[Unofficial Classes Here](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-cards-for-forum-based-tol/249?source_topic_id=1799)
Important Info: If the same roles fight each other, they will both live. The Mercenary wil refuse to fight if fighting against their contract. Cult will always lose against the Paladin. If someone is jailed, they cannot fight. You can cancel a battle. **The Revenant** is at the same position as the player they are bound to. If you are somehow forced into a fight, you will always win.
Additional ideas by the public (enter ideas here): Bounty recommended a different win con (fight based rather then survival based). Changed abilities to focus on your "champion" rather then just random fights. Thanks to B_Psycho for the recommendations for collaboration between AM and their champion.
###Changelog: 5/25/17: Creation. 5/25/17 (Later): Revamp for balance + stability, added unofficial classes. 5/25/17 (Even later): Edited the abilities so the champion and AM could colaberate. 5/26/17: Rewording, clarity, and [color=#FF287D]color.[/color] 5/30/17: Serpent > Scorpion
##To-do: Balance the tier list Continue refining the class and abilities Lore
---

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Arena Master
item.dc:creator: deadfrien
item.description:
#Arena Master

Neutral Special

Conditioning of the Arena (Passive): You and your champion are immune to death at night and from being occupied. Your champion is notified of their status. You and your champion may speak at night.

Coercion of Champions (Day): If you don’t have one, you may select someone to become your champion.

Forced Participation (Day): Your next use of Enter the Arena will have the fight occur in the same night. - 2 uses

Enter the Arena (Night): Choose a player to fight your champion tomorrow night. The loser dies. This does NOT count as a roleblock. (Winner based on role list.)

Offensive loses to Defensive.
Defensive loses to Patient.
Patient loses to Offensive.
Cheater wins against any.
Fool cannot be chosen as a champion or a fighter.

Tier list here.

Your objective is to have your champions win 3 fights.

The main reason for keeping the Merc in Offensive is due to the fact that I don’t want any type to have too many more then the other. The Cheater list probably has too many, tbh. If I could figure out the balancing (or if someone could help me with the balancing wink wink), I’d be perfectly willing to move the Mercenary to the Cheater type.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Arena Master
item.dc:creator: B_Psycho2
item.description:
Hey, I think this is a great role. However, would it be wise for it to spawn in with NK’s in the game? I don’t know. I’ve got some ideas for it.

I request that you add links to all unofficial classes in the bottom, though.
__
Day Ability: Coercion (Changed name from Choose your Champion: You can’t passively choose a champion unless it’s random. I suggest it be changed to a day ability. Also, if both players lose, should they live? Given that this isn’t a traditional NK, and shouldn’t be, it shouldn’t cause as much death.) (Tell me if this is too much, but could the Champion get some sort of menu to send anonymous messages to you during the day and night? In a way that they could recommend fights to make without knowing who you are, and you can talk back without revealing yourself. That way you can have 2 playstyles, which is 1) go through targets trying to find a better warrior, or 2), find easier battles for your current champion to win faster)

Passive: Recruit Conditioning (Changed name from Fighting Instinct): You and Your champion are immune to death at night., along with occupation. Your champion is notified of their status.

**Serpent:**A while back I changed the “Serpent”, fleshing it out into the Scorpion(Probably offensive or cheater), Iudex(Definitely fits in cheater), and Ritualist.

If this is the serpent you are referring to, I ask that you change the name.

Mercenary: Being always armed, I think the Mercenary should be in the cheater category, and instead of killing herself, she should simply refuse to fight if told to face off against her contract.

Overall, this is one of the best ideas I’ve ever seen, and keep up the great work
